title: I recognize this font but can't place the name..
content:
Hey everyone. I know I've seen this font around but I've never personally needed to use it until now. Does it jump right out to one of you? Thanks for taking the time to see if you could help, I really appreciate it!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819090135im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Temp_6486.jpg)
author: Mallion
